help.runwithargument: For help with bot setup, run the bot with the `--help` argument.
bot.ping: hi, please give me a star on github: <https://github.com/mooziii/obsi-bot>
generic.nopermissions.long: You don't have the required permission (${required}) to perform this action
generic.nopermissions.rolerequired: You need the ${roleName} role to perform this action
generic.placeholder: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. At vero eos et accusam et justo duo dolores et ea rebum. Stet clita kasd gubergren, no sea takimata sanctus est Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
poll.instructions:
This poll ends <t:${endtimestamp}:R>
Use the menu below to vote.
poll.ended: You can't vote for polls that already ended.
poll.winner: The poll ended. The winner is: **${option}**
giveaway.embed.author: Giveaway by ${owner}
giveaway.embed.description:
You can win **${prizecount}x ${prize}** by reacting with ${emoji}!
The givaway ends <t:${end}:R>
Hosted by: <@${owner}>
modal.createTag.title: Tag creation
modal.createTag.short.placeholder: Insert a short word to use as the tag-keyword
modal.createTag.long: The content where the tag points to
command.help.description: A command for, you guessed it, help!
command.giveaway.rolerequired: You need the "Giveaway Permissions" role to manage giveaways (or you must be the host of a giveaway to roll it manually).
command.giveaway.create.argument.prizeco: The amount of prizes to win
command.giveaway.create.argument.endtime: The exact timestamp of when the giveaway should end
command.giveaway.roll.argument.id.descri: Id of the giveaway to roll (id of the message from the giveaway)
command.poll.rolerequired: You need the "Poll Permissions" role to manage polls (or you must be the host of a poll to end it manually).
command.poll.create.argument.endtimestam: The exact timestamp of when the poll should end
command.poll.create.argument.options.des: List of options for the poll (split by a comma)
command.poll.end.argument.id.description: Id of the poll to end (id of the message from the poll)
command.radio.failure.alreadyconnected: I'm already connected to a voice channel or currently play another radio stream.
command.radio.success: Now playing **${radio}** ${emoji} in <#${voicechannel}>. Enjoy the radiostream!
command.minecraft.modding.description: Command to generate buildscripts for fabric and quilt.
command.minecraft.versions.embed.title: Minecraft Versions
command.blacklist.view.description: Prints every blacklisted word and why
command.blacklist.add.description: Adds a entry to the blacklist
command.blacklist.add.success: `${word}` has been added to the blacklist.
command.blacklist.remove.description: Removes an entry from the blacklist
command.blacklist.remove.success: `${word}` has been removed from the blacklist.
command.blacklist.argument.why.descripti: The reason why is this word on the blacklist
command.blacklist.argument.filterVariant: Whether special variants of this word should be blacklisted as well
